code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GridContext}from'./GridContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cell=_ref=>{let{rowIndex,colIndex}=_ref;const{grid,toggleCell}=useContext(GridContext);const isOn=grid[rowIndex][colIndex];const handleClick=()=>{toggleCell(rowIndex,colIndex);};const cellStyle={width:'100px',height:'100px',border:'1px solid grey',backgroundColor:isOn?'black':'white',boxSizing:'border-box'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:cellStyle,onClick:handleClick});};export default Cell;
